trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Alabaster
There was one other sighting in Alabaster on or around October 22nd 2010
Summary: flashing colorful lights in sky shooting..
divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend and I were sitting outside drinking hot chocolate, and we were looking at the stars. She noticed that there were colorful lights flashing in the sky. At first, I thought it was a plane, but then it just shot off really fast. Then, we saw another one just staying in the same spot for a duration of about 30 minutes. It would occasionally just shot a couple of feet in different directions.It would flash colors of blue, green, pink, and red. I kept looking around and i noticed that six of them went all in the same direction within a five minute time period. A few minutes later, one caame really fast shotting right over us, then slowing down. I do belive that this sighting was a UFO.
